page.title: 01MOLE VALLEY BELOW REIGATE
page.content: Area is based around a stretch of the River Mole, flat open farming land borders the river to allow for flooding which can be frequent. A main road runs through the centre of the block from north to south. There are small scattered houses over most of the area. The edge of a small built up area around another main road is included in the east. The south east corner inludes a new estate of houses with a school. The majority of land is used for farming - mostly sown and fertilized grassland for pasture with many dairy farms in the area.
